Detailed Description

V8100 VME board implementation.

Author:
NDA
Version:
1.0
Date:
09/2008
Provides methods, properties and defines to handle V8100 VME boards

Definition in file V8100.c.

Function Documentation

BOOL V8100_close ( V8100_data *  p_data  ) 

V8100 boards closing and resource free.

Provides specific handling for V8100 boards closing.

Parameters:
p_data Pointer to board data
Returns:
TRUE: board successfully closed
Note:
Must be called when done with any other board specific API.

BOOL V8100_open_com ( V8100_data *  p_data,
const char *  com_str,
V8100_RS232_BITRATE  bitrate 
)

V8100 boards data initialization and serial communication device opening.

Provides specific handling for V8100 boards opening on serial communication device.

Parameters:
p_data Pointer to board data
com_str The serial communication device to open e.g COM1.. COM# for Windows or /dev/ttyS0.. /dev/ttyS# or /dev/ttyUSB0.. /dev/ttyUSB# for Linux
bitrate The serial device communication baudrate
Returns:
TRUE: board successfully opened
Note:
Must be called before any other board specific API.
